title: How to Make Chinese Dumplings Contiguity

steps.headline: Shred the cabbage and put into pot.
Mix the cabbage and minced meat together by hand.
Add the balm, salt and a little tai bai fen (cornstarch/cornflour) and mix again.
Massage the cabbage mixture with your hand for 10 min to make it dry.
Add more tai bai fen while you massage the mixture, if you feel that there's not enough.
Put the mixture on the crusts.
Wrap the crusts up as in the picture below.
Put the dumplings in boiling water.
steps.description: First, they will sink but in 2-3 minutes they should come up, which indicates that they are cooked.

steps.headline: Transfer them carefully from the pot to a plate and enjoy.

text: Shred the cabbage and put into pot.  Mix the cabbage and minced meat together by hand.  Add the balm, salt and a little tai bai fen (cornstarch/cornflour) and mix again.  Massage the cabbage mixture with your hand for 10 min to make it dry.  Add more tai bai fen while you massage the mixture, if you feel that there's not enough.  Put the mixture on the crusts.  Wrap the crusts up as in the picture below.  Put the dumplings in boiling water. First, they will sink but in 2-3 minutes they should come up, which indicates that they are cooked. Transfer them carefully from the pot to a plate and enjoy.
